info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 2:57PM CDT until July 17 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Madison County in southwestern Illinois... North central St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Granite City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Belleville, Granite City, East St. Louis, Collinsville, Edwardsville, Fairview Heights, Glen Carbon, Troy, Maryville, Pontoon Beach, Centreville, Caseyville, Washington Park, Madison, Venice, Fairmont City, South Roxana, Alorton, Roxana, and Brooklyn. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 9 and 12. This also includes Horseshoe Lake State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
